name: matcha
description: ### Install resources 1. npm init -y 2. npm i express bcryptjs jsonwebtoken config express-validator mongoose // dependencies 3. npm i -D nodemon concurrently // devDependencies 4. Postman 5. .gitignore file with 'node_modules/'

scripts.install-all: npm i && npm i ./backend/ && npm i ./frontend/ && node ./backend/install.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run server" "cd frontend && npm start"
